root.text: Textile Composite materials are replacing day by day the conventional metallic materials due to their highly advanced and advantageous properties. It is a fast-emerging field and expected to be used in various other fields in near future.

In this workshop, Various Textile composites and its manufacturing techniques will be discussed and some textile composite sample products will be shown. Students can examine those products and clarify their queries.

text: 8:25 AM - Students should assemble at Y Block allotted Hall.
8:30 AM – 10:00 AM - A Lecture session regarding Fibre Composites and Manufacturing techniques
10:45 AM – 12:00 PM - Lecture session regarding Natural Fibre reinforced thermoplastic composites.
In case of on spot registration (subjected to availability), the students are requested to bring the exact sum of the mentioned amount for general registration along with the respective workshop fee.
Participants are requested to carry the hard copy of the workshop confirmation receipt.
Participants must have a valid ID card of their respective educational institutions.

root.text: Under any circumstances, the fee will not be refunded.
Fee is exclusive of food and accommodation
In addition to the workshop fee there will be a mandatory KRIYA registration fee of,
